title: Council Regulation (EC) No 131/94 of 24 January 1994 opening a Community tariff quota for frozen buffalo meat falling within CN code 0202 30 90 (1994)
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 131/94 of 24 January 1994 opening a Community tariff quota for frozen buffalo meat falling within CN code 0202 30 90 (1994)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
1. A Community tariff quota for frozen buffalo meat falling within CN code 0202 30 90 amounting to a total of 2 250 tonnes, expressed in terms of boneless meat, is hereby opened for 1994.
2. The Common Customs Tariff duty applicable to the quota shall be 20 % and the levy shall be nil.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 January 1994.
For the Council
The President
G. MORAITIS
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 24. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 125/93 (OJ No L 18, 27. 1. 1993, p. 1).
